bcbioRNASeq 0.1.8
  • Reference

Design Formula Accessor

Source: R/methods-design.R

design.Rd

Design Formula Accessor

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
design(object)

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq,formula
design(object) <- value

Arguments

object

Object.
value

a formula used for estimating dispersion and fitting Negative Binomial GLMs

Value

formula.

See also

  • BiocGenerics::design.

  • DESeq2::design.

Examples

load(system.file("extdata/bcb.rda", package = "bcbioRNASeq"))

# bcbioRNASeq
design(bcb) %>% print(showEnv = FALSE)
#> ~1

# Assignment support
design(bcb) <- formula(~group)
#> using pre-existing size factors
#> estimating dispersions
#> found already estimated dispersions, replacing these
#> gene-wise dispersion estimates
#> mean-dispersion relationship
#> final dispersion estimates
#> fitting model and testing
design(bcb) %>% print(showEnv = FALSE)
#> ~group
